mapper.select: SELECT company_code, company_name, company_manager, company_tel, company_email, company_address FROM company
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company (company_code, company_name, company_manager, company_tel, company_email, company_address) VALUES (#{company_code}, #{company_name}, #{company_manager}, #{company_tel}, #{company_email}, #{company_address})
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET company_name = #{company_name}, company_manager = #{company_manager}, company_tel = #{company_tel}, company_email = #{company_email}, company_address = #{company_address} WHERE company_code = #{company_code}
